entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -16.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Temperature: -16.9°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 58 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
